content: Thanks for the response Reiner. Vue definitely throws an error, which is why I passed the option to name them with the prefix of v-I’ve been on the fence thinking about the best way to name components with similar names to native DOM elements. In a full app, I usually only have a few, so remembering to use a prefix when registering the component isn’t a hassle. It’d probably be better to just name them different in the first place to something like VButton and VHeader to save myself from any mistakes and for consistency.
